etomica.data.meter

Class MeterRDFPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.meter.MeterRDFPC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAction, DataSourceIndependent, IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource

    public class MeterRDFPC
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAction, IEtomicaDataSource, DataSourceIndependent
    Meter for tabulation of the atomic radial distribution function (RDF). The meter takes data via actionPerformed and returns the average RDF via getData. This implementation uses a PotentialCalculation to perform the actual work and so can take advantage of neighbor/cell lists so long as the RDF range is not greater than the PotentialMaster range.
